name: DailyAffirmation
0:
”Alexa, open Daily Affirmation.”
”Give me my daily affirmation.”
”Affirm me.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily affirmation
des: A long list of phrases you can listen to every morning or before entering a difficult time in your life.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
